item.description:
The September WebSquared meetup will take place at the Cambridge Brewing Company, which is a short walk from the Kendall/MIT T station. We will have a small area reserved, and there will be WiFi. Those that are interested can showcase their work, pitch ideas, or make general announcements.

Let's have some beers (or wine) and talk innovation and entrepreneurship!
item.how_to_find_us: We will have an area reserved in the brewery. Ask for the WebSquared group at the door.
item.name: WebSquared September Meetup
